strapiPost.title: BMX Stadium Wins Awards
strapiPost.content:
The USA BMX Hardesty National Stadium and National Headquarters, which was a Vision Tulsa project, won four awards last week.

  • Big night: The win came at the ABC (Associated Builders and Contractors) Oklahoma Excellence in Construction Awards Banquet held in Tulsa.
  • A space for everyone: They’ve hosted BMX competitive events and activities for Tulsa Parks day camp field trip last summer.

﻿
